Projects

  • [VimMotions]: Chrome Extension that allows for Vim-style keybindings for efficient text navigation and editing in browser inputs.

  • [MiloCam]: Glorified nanny-cam that uses facebook/detr-resnet-50 from Hugging Face to detect my dog (Milo) via webcam and sends me a Discord message when he's at the back door.

  • [ymir.nvim]: A snowy mountain sunset theme for a better looking Neovim config.

    • There are some more projects on Github, but they didn't quite make the cut.
